trans-unit.source: Specifies the current stage of a ClickOnce download operation.
trans-unit.target: Specifica la fase corrente di un'operazione di download di ClickOnce.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState> is passed by way of the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> member of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, which is used by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState> viene passato per mezzo del <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> membro del <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>, che viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> eventi.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to determine what portion of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment has already been downloaded to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare i membri di questa enumerazione per determinare quale parte di [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribuzione è già stata scaricata sul computer locale.

trans-unit.source: The following code example installs the latest [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application update asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente consente di installare la versione più recente [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applicazione aggiorna in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] is downloading the DLLs and data files that comprised the application.
trans-unit.target: È in corso il download delle DLL e dei file di dati che costituiscono l'applicazione in [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
È in corso il download del manifesto dell'applicazione in [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
È in corso il download del manifesto di distribuzione in [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
